verses.1: En un, sanggamte pum khat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam?
verses.2: Tua pen a puan ngawng tungah Aaron º khamul kai suk zui-in a lu tung panin a taak suk, sathau manpha tawh kibang hi.
verses.3: Tua pen Zion mualte tungah a kia, Hermon mual pan a hong piang daitui tawh kibang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in nuntak tawntungna thupha tua munah a pia hi.
